title: What would kill Amazon in the next 10 years? - Quora

response.answer_text: The chances of Amazon being killed off by the free market is slim to none. They are the biggest online marketplace in America. They are one of if not the top player in cloud computing. They have bought hundreds of other companies to develop other products or services. They have their hand in nearly every pot. What would kill Amazon? The US government forcing them to split up.
